attributes.action: to Stop Tesco from building the biggest superstore in the country in Dartford, Kent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A previous application was refused by Mrs Ruth Kelly in May 2006. In her rejection of the proposal the Secretary of State commented that in relation to the townscape generally ‘the height of the residential elements of the proposal would dominate the park and that the overall mass of the scheme would be out of character with the historic grain of Dartford.’
The resubmitted plans are for an even larger store which the infrastructure of Dartford will not be able to cope with. The local council have been heavily involved with Tesco in planning this application to such an extent that we no longer believe they can fairly and objectively decide this application.
